abstract: Caterpillar plans to buy a subsidiary of a South Korean manufacturer of components for earthmoving and other machinery.
snippet: Caterpillar plans to buy a subsidiary of a South Korean manufacturer of components for earthmoving and other machinery.
lead_paragraph: Caterpillar plans to buy a subsidiary of a South Korean manufacturer of components for earth moving and other machinery, The Associated Press reported.

headline.main: Caterpillar to Buy South Korean Equipment-Maker
